The director of communications for the J: M. Smucker Company confirmed that no Canine Carry Outs products are being recalled.
Health Canada: s list of current and past recalls does not mention the Canine Carry Outs brand.
The Food and Drug Administration: s recall history in the US also shows no results for the recall of Canine Carry Outs treats.
The claim that Canine Carry Outs treats: s stomach to burst is false, as propylene glycol, one of the ingredients in the treats, is considered safe for consumption by both humans and terrestrial mammals.
